page.title: 02A day in the life of Scott
page.content: I wake up at about 7.00 a.m., get out of bed and go downstairs to say "Good morning to my dog, Rosie. Then I get changed and Mummy changes and takes me to school which starts at 9.00 a.m. At school we all sit on the carpet and the teacher takes the register. We do some work about Plains Indians, then we go out to play. Sometimes we play "It" and "Chase" and "Cars". When we are allowed on the field we play football and races. There are climbing bars to play on as well. When we go back into class we do some maths and language and sing songs, then we have dinner. After dinner we go out to play. We come in and do some more work then, at 3.15 p.m. we go home. After school I get changed and go out to play with my friend James on bikes. When Daddy comes home we have dinner and I go to bed.
